alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Burnett County through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Webster, or 21 miles west of Spooner, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hertel around 355 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Big Sand Lake and Yellow Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.
